document_data.name: ''Sapphire Pendant of Mage Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sapphire pendants of mage armor''''' were enchanted pieces of jewelry worn by the [[aarakocra]] elders of [[Kir Sabal]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: These enchanted [[amulet]]s were inlaid with a single deep-blue [[sapphire]].
document_data.Powers: ''Sapphire pendants of mage armor'' protected the wearer from magical attacks and enhanced the wearer's defensive spellcasting abilities. Additionally, the ''sapphire pendants'' allowed the wearer to cast the ''[[mage armor]]'' spell.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Asharra]]: the aarakocra [[wizard]] leader of Kir Sabal in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
